name: Sweet Madame
desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.

value.text: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

value.name: Sweet Madame
value.desc:
Sweet Madame

Perhaps some have never seen a chicken runâ€¦ But there's no one who hasn't tried a Sweet Madame!

customize.name: Recipe: Sweet Madame
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sweet Madame.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Sweet Flower
customize.desc: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

customize.name: Delicious Sweet Madame
customize.desc: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.

customize.name: Suspicious Sweet Madame
customize.desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.

customize.name: Rosaria
customize.desc: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

customize.name: Dinner of Judgment
customize.desc: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.
